channel.title: Undead Legion (Custom Faction)
channel.description:
Main Role
Appears in every Undead Legion Game >Necromancer Lord _Night Abilities_ **Raise Dead** Convert a Player into a Undead Legion Role.Every Second Day. **Collect Food** Kill a Player gain a Feed Use _Day Abilities_ **Feed** Feed a Member of the Undead Legion.0 Uses.One Use Per day you will be Occupied at Night.
Converted Members >Feast Master (Butler) _Passive Abilities_ **Hungry** If does not Feed for three Days Dies. **Dutiful** Immune to being Occupied at Night _Night Abilities_ **Serve Wine** Occupy a Player **Feast** Feed a Member of the Undead Legion.2 Uses.
>Necromancer Apprentice (Court Wizard) _Passive Abilities_ **Hungry** If does not Feed for three Days Dies. _Night Abilities_ **Command Ghoul** Make a Player Appear as a Undead Legion to the Necromancy Senser. **Command Skeleton** Prevent a Undead Legion Player from Dying and make Him not Appear as a Undead Legion to the Necromancy Senser.1 Use.
>Blood Drinker (Drunk) _Passive Abilities_ **Royal Blood** Put yourself to become a King. **Hungry** If does not Feed for three Days Dies. _Night Abilities_ **Bebauchery** Make a Player Target You. **Drink Blood** Select a Player that Player will be noted that they blood was drank.Feed Yourself.
>Beast (Hunter) _Passive Abilities_ **Hungry** If does not Feed for three Days Dies. **Isolation** Immune to being Occupied at Night _Night Abilities_ **Hunt** Kill a Player that Accused a Undead Legion Member.
>Necromancers Guard(Knight) _Passive Abilities_ **Hungry** If does not Feed for three Days Dies. _Night Abilities_ **Protect the Master** Choose a Undead Legion Member if they get invested or attacked.You kill the Attacker/Invest.You will remove everything they wrote in the journal this day at the Cost of your Life.
>Gargoyle(Noble) _Passive Abilities_ **Hungry** If does not Feed for three Days Dies. **Royal Blood** Put yourself to become a King. **Linked Brains** When Feeding a Noble feed the other noble aswell _Day Abilities_ **Maid Spy** Hear Whisper From soone and too soone the Next day. _Night Abilities_ **Crier** Send a Message to everyone. **No Noble Task** Prevent Soone from Voting
>Silent Watcher (Observer) _Passive Abilities_ **Hungry** If does not Feed for three Days Dies. _Night Abilities_ **Silent Watch** See who Soone visits and who visits them.This does not count as a Visit.Unless is a Observer. (For Example if you Visit a Hunter which has hes trap you will not bleed.But the Observer still sees you.) **Magic Ball** See if Soone can be Converted.
>Poisoned Zombie (Physician) _Passive Abilities_ **Hungry** If does not Feed for three Days Dies. **Remedy Studies** Immune to Poison _Night Abilities_ **Heal** Heal a Player if that Player gets attacked by the Necromancer Lord he still gains 1 Feed **Defile** Make a player that is going to die appear as a another Role. Remove the Journal.1 Use.
>Fallen Priest (Priest) _Passive Abilities_ **Hungry** If does not Feed for three Days Dies. **Spirits of the Dead** Allows to communite with Dead Undead Legion members. Works After Dead _Night Abilities_ **Masterfull Necromancy** Ressurect a Blue Dragon and Convert them.1 Use.
>Abomination Quenn (Princess) _Passive Abilities_ **Hungry** If does not Feed for three Days Dies. **Royal Blood** Put yourself to become a King. _Night Abilities_ **Bat Eyelashes** Determine a Players Class Type. **Dead Wisp** Make two Random People see that you been visited by soone you Choose.Can be more then 1.2 Uses
>Seer (Psychic) _Passive Abilities_ **Hungry** If does not Feed for three Days Dies. _Day Abilities_ **Telepathy** Send a Message to everyone they will not know who seen it.2 Uses **Misdirect** Make Person accuse soone of treason.2 Uses _Night Abilities_ **Private Thoughts** Choose a Player if that Player is a Investigitive Role get Results they got from a random Day.
>Skeleton Warrior(Mercenary) _Passive Abilities_ **Hungry** If does not Feed for three Days Dies. _Night Abilities_ **Master** Make a Undead Legion member Unkillable even from Hunger.And Appear as a Blue Dragon.If your Target dies you commit Suicide(Can't Be Healed).1 Use.
>Necromancy Senser (Blue Dragon Investigitive) _Night Abilities_ **Sense Necromancy** See if soone is the Member of the Undead Legion **Make Undead Dead** Kill soone that is a Member of the Undead Legion you had to investigate that Person first and he had to Appear as a Member of the Undead Legion.1 Use.
_Converted Version_ >Senser of Dead _Passive Abilities_ **Hungry** If does not Feed for three Days Dies. _Night Abilities_ **Sense Remove** Make a Member of the Undead Legion not Appear as it. Necromancer Lord Appears As Physician

item.title: Undead Legion (Custom Faction)
item.dc:creator: Jakena
item.description:
It is a Permenant Ability.

Read full topic

item.title: Undead Legion (Custom Faction)
item.dc:creator: Jakena
item.description:
3.Infinite Amount But does have do feed every Undead Legion member and Butler Becomes Unique because hes Feast power is super powerfull.
2.Feed can be Day Ability.That is only allowed to be used once per Day and you will be occupied at night.Done

Read full topic

item.title: Undead Legion (Custom Faction)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
No. Hes asking you to show supporting evidence (In the same post!) when you make a claim like “[x] is under-powered”

Read full topic

item.title: Undead Legion (Custom Faction)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Jakena:

Master

Make a Undead Legion member Unkillable even from Hunger.And Appear as a Blue Dragon.If your Target dies you commit Suicide(Can’t Be Healed).1 Use.

this is his only ability. It is one use.

are you fucking tell me that this is not under powered?

Read full topic

item.title: Undead Legion (Custom Faction)
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
I agree, I would sorta like to see it in a SFoL game. Once its more balanced

Read full topic

item.title: Undead Legion (Custom Faction)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
1. I agree with Noz. Rope, if you say something like that, you have to back it up with evidence, otherwise, its just you word and no one has to act on it
  2. You can only have 2 passives/night abilities per character, so this:
Jakena:

Necromancer Lord

Night Abilities

Raise Dead

Convert a Player into a Undead Legion Role.Every Second Day.

Collect Food

Kill a Player gain a Feed Use

Feed

Feed a Member of the Undead Legion.0 Uses.

doesnt work

And 3. What is the Undead Legion’s character cap, how many living players can be part of it at one time?

Other than that, I like the idea!

Read full topic

item.title: Undead Legion (Custom Faction)
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
Prove your point Rope. It’s very tiring

Read full topic

item.title: Undead Legion (Custom Faction)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
mercenary’s converted form is very weak

Read full topic

item.title: Undead Legion (Custom Faction)
item.dc:creator: Queen_Alfa
item.description:
Pretty sure this goes into Classes/Lore so I moved it

Read full topic

item.title: Undead Legion (Custom Faction)
item.dc:creator: Jakena
item.description:
Main Role

Appears in every Undead Legion Game

Necromancer Lord
Night Abilities
Raise Dead
Convert a Player into a Undead Legion Role.Every Second Day.
Collect Food
Kill a Player gain a Feed Use
Day Abilities
Feed
Feed a Member of the Undead Legion.0 Uses.One Use Per day you will be Occupied at Night.

Converted Members

Feast Master (Butler)
Passive Abilities
Hungry
If does not Feed for three Days Dies.
Dutiful
Immune to being Occupied at Night
Night Abilities
Serve Wine
Occupy a Player
Feast
Feed a Member of the Undead Legion.2 Uses.

Necromancer Apprentice (Court Wizard)
Passive Abilities
Hungry
If does not Feed for three Days Dies.
Night Abilities
Command Ghoul
Make a Player Appear as a Undead Legion to the Necromancy Senser.
Command Skeleton
Prevent a Undead Legion Player from Dying and make Him not Appear as a Undead Legion to the Necromancy Senser.1 Use.

Blood Drinker (Drunk)
Passive Abilities
Royal Blood
Put yourself to become a King.
Hungry
If does not Feed for three Days Dies.
Night Abilities
Bebauchery
Make a Player Target You.
Drink Blood
Select a Player that Player will be noted that they blood was drank.Feed Yourself.

Beast (Hunter)
Passive Abilities
Hungry
If does not Feed for three Days Dies.
Isolation
Immune to being Occupied at Night
Night Abilities
Hunt
Kill a Player that Accused a Undead Legion Member.

Necromancers Guard(Knight)
Passive Abilities
Hungry
If does not Feed for three Days Dies.
Night Abilities
Protect the Master
Choose a Undead Legion Member if they get invested or attacked.You kill the Attacker/Invest.You will remove everything they wrote in the journal this day at the Cost of your Life.

Gargoyle(Noble)
Passive Abilities
Hungry
If does not Feed for three Days Dies.
Royal Blood
Put yourself to become a King.
Linked Brains
When Feeding a Noble feed the other noble aswell
Day Abilities
Maid Spy
Hear Whisper From soone and too soone the Next day.
Night Abilities
Crier
Send a Message to everyone.
No Noble Task
Prevent Soone from Voting

Silent Watcher (Observer)
Passive Abilities
Hungry
If does not Feed for three Days Dies.
Night Abilities
Silent Watch
See who Soone visits and who visits them.This does not count as a Visit.Unless is a Observer.
(For Example if you Visit a Hunter which has hes trap you will not bleed.But the Observer still sees you.)
Magic Ball
See if Soone can be Converted.

Poisoned Zombie (Physician)
Passive Abilities
Hungry
If does not Feed for three Days Dies.
Remedy Studies
Immune to Poison
Night Abilities
Heal
Heal a Player if that Player gets attacked by the Necromancer Lord he still gains 1 Feed
Defile
Make a player that is going to die appear as a another Role.
Remove the Journal.1 Use.

Fallen Priest (Priest)
Passive Abilities
Hungry
If does not Feed for three Days Dies.
Spirits of the Dead
Allows to communite with Dead Undead Legion members.
Works After Dead
Night Abilities
Masterfull Necromancy
Ressurect a Blue Dragon and Convert them.1 Use.

Abomination Quenn (Princess)
Passive Abilities
Hungry
If does not Feed for three Days Dies.
Royal Blood
Put yourself to become a King.
Night Abilities
Bat Eyelashes
Determine a Players Class Type.
Dead Wisp
Make two Random People see that you been visited by soone you Choose.Can be more then 1.2 Uses

Seer (Psychic)
Passive Abilities
Hungry
If does not Feed for three Days Dies.
Day Abilities
Telepathy
Send a Message to everyone they will not know who seen it.2 Uses
Misdirect
Make Person accuse soone of treason.2 Uses
Night Abilities
Private Thoughts
Choose a Player if that Player is a Investigitive Role get Results they got from a random Day.

Skeleton Warrior(Mercenary)
Passive Abilities
Hungry
If does not Feed for three Days Dies.
Night Abilities
Master
Make a Undead Legion member Unkillable even from Hunger.And Appear as a Blue Dragon.If your Target dies you commit Suicide(Can’t Be Healed).1 Use.

Necromancy Senser (Blue Dragon Investigitive)
Night Abilities
Sense Necromancy
See if soone is the Member of the Undead Legion
Make Undead Dead
Kill soone that is a Member of the Undead Legion you had to investigate that Person first and he had to Appear as a Member of the Undead Legion.1 Use.

Converted Version

Senser of Dead
Passive Abilities
Hungry
If does not Feed for three Days Dies.
Night Abilities
Sense Remove
Make a Member of the Undead Legion not Appear as it.
Necromancer Lord Appears As Physician

Read full topic
